name: Home Sweet Home (itch) (Bit Gamey)
description:
Antonia saw Balint drop a sugar bowl in the backyard. All the sugar cubes got scattered and now she has to find them and take them all home before the time runs out! 

Avoid the spiders and Balint as you guide Antonia around the yard (using W/A/S/D or arrow keys) to find all 15 cubes before the countdown beats you.

Good luck!
